  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.controller

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.controller.GameController

      class GameController extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • game
          Game game
          Instance of the game on which the control takes place.
        • lastStatus
          GameStatus lastStatus
          Last game's status before going to "halted" status
        • pingExecutor
          ScheduledExecutorService pingExecutor
          Executor for handling periodic ping checks.
        • playerPingTimestamps
          Map<Player,Long> playerPingTimestamps
          Map to keep track of player ping timestamps.
        • random
          Random random
          Attribute used to generate random choices.
        • timer
          Timer timer
          Attribute to manage timed operations.
        • timerTask
          TimerTask timerTask
          Specific task for operations that must be performed periodically.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.Codex

      class Codex extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cardStarterInserted
          boolean cardStarterInserted
          Boolean indicating whether the Starter card has been inserted.
        • codex
          Side[][] codex
          Data structure of the codex.
        • codexFillOrder
          ArrayList<Coords> codexFillOrder
          List that collects the order in which the codex is created.
        • counterCodex
          int[] counterCodex
          Counter for values in the codex. 0 = FUNGI 1 = PLANT 2 = ANIMAL 3 = INSECT 4 = QUILL 5 = INKWELL 6 = MANUSCRIPT 7 = COVERED
        • maxColumn
          int maxColumn
          The rightmost occupied column.
        • maxRow
          int maxRow
          The bottommost occupied row.
        • minColumn
          int minColumn
          The leftmost occupied column.
        • minRow
          int minRow
          The topmost occupied row.
        • pointCodex
          int pointCodex
          Count the points derived from the placement of the cards.

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.cardObjective

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.cardObjective.CardObjective

      class CardObjective extends Card implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • image
          String image
          Image of the card.
        • objective
          String objective
          Textual description of the card's objective.
        • parameters
          ArrayList<Value> parameters
          Parameters used to calculate the points. In the case of Objective cards that use diagonal, the values in the array must be written in order from left to right of the card. In the case of Objective cards that use the pile, the values in the array must be written starting from the card in the codex that gives rise to the pile.
        • point
          int point
          Card points.
        • scoreStrategy
          CalculateScoreStrategy scoreStrategy
          Strategy to apply for calculating the points given by the objective.
